findings.title: Unchecked return value of send
findings.explanation: The contract calls winner.send(winAmount) without checking the returned boolean. If the send fails (e.g., due to out-of-gas or a fallback revert), the contract will silently continue and mark payedOut as true, locking funds indefinitely.
findings.fix_suggestion: Use require(winner.send(winAmount)); or, better, use winner.transfer(winAmount) which throws on failure to ensure the transaction reverts on unsuccessful payout.

findings.title: Missing access control on withdrawLeftOver
findings.explanation: Any external caller can invoke withdrawLeftOver once payedOut is true, draining the contract's remaining balance. There is no restriction on who can call this function.
findings.fix_suggestion: Restrict this function to a specific role (e.g., contract owner or a designated administrator) by adding an access modifier such as onlyOwner.
